app.title: Monica Proxy Wails
app.subtitle: Tool to convert Monica interface (Web) to API

control.title: Service Control
control.desc: Start/Stop service, test config and query quota
control.testSuccess: API config test complete, check details

config.monicaDesc: Configure connection parameters for Monica service
config.cookieHolder: Enter Cookie after logging into Monica
config.botUidHolder: Custom Bot UID (Required for Custom Bot mode)
config.securityDesc: API Access Token, Rate Limiting, Timeout settings
config.proxyDesc: Network Proxy settings (detailed config in Server page)
config.proxyWarn: Proxy enabled but no address configured, please set in 'Server Config' page

server.basicDesc: Configure server listening address and port

logging.basicDesc: Configure log level, format and basic parameters
logging.advancedDesc: Detailed logging and file management settings
logging.detailContent: Detailed request logs will record the following:
logging.detailItem1: Request details from external tool to this software (Stage 1)
logging.detailItem2: Request details from this software to Monica API (Stage 2)
logging.detailItem3: Response details from Monica to this software (Stage 3)
logging.detailItem4: Response details from this software to external tool (Stage 4)
logging.detailWarn: Recommended to enable only for debugging, keep disabled for daily use
logging.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the log file? This operation cannot be undone and all logs will be permanently deleted.

copyright.projectDesc: Based on open source project development
copyright.basedOn: Secondary development based on open source project
copyright.descText1: This project is a secondary development based on https://github.com/ycvk/monica-proxy project.
copyright.descText4: Thanks to the original author ycvk for the outstanding contribution. This project has extended functions and optimized the interface on the basis of the original project, and provided multiple GUI frame support (including native Fyne frame and Web-based Wails frame).

validation.requiredFields: Please ensure the following required fields are filled:
validation.botUid: Bot UID (if Custom Bot mode enabled)

error.getLogInfo: Failed to get log file info
